name: InvoiceApproval
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

extended_output_schema.name: customer_id
extended_output_schema.label: Customer ID
extended_output_schema.hint: Identifier of the customer for which this invoice needs to be created. Should be specified if subscription_id is not specified.

extended_output_schema.name: subscription_id
extended_output_schema.label: Subscription ID
extended_output_schema.hint: Identifier of the subscription for which this invoice needs to be created. Should be specified if customer_id is not specified.(not applicable for consolidated invoice).

extended_output_schema.name: auto_collection
extended_output_schema.label: Auto collection
extended_output_schema.hint: Whether payments needs to be collected automatically for this customer.

extended_output_schema.name: token_id
extended_output_schema.label: Token ID
extended_output_schema.hint: Token generated by Chargebee JS representing payment method details.

extended_output_schema.name: payment_source_id
extended_output_schema.label: Payment source ID
extended_output_schema.hint: Payment source to be used for this payment.

extended_output_schema.name: currency_code
extended_output_schema.label: Currency code
extended_output_schema.hint: The currency code (ISO 4217 format) of the invoice amount. Required if Multicurrency is enabled

toggle_field.name: remove_general_note
toggle_field.label: Remove general note
toggle_field.hint: Accepted values are true or false

toggle_field.name: replace_primary_payment_source
toggle_field.label: Replace primary payment source
toggle_field.hint: Accepted values are true or false

toggle_field.name: retain_payment_source
toggle_field.label: Retain payment source
toggle_field.hint: Accepted values are true or false

toggle_field.name: validation_status
toggle_field.label: Customer type
toggle_field.hint: Allowed vaalues are: not_validated, valid, partially_valid, invalid

properties.label: Payment intent ID
properties.hint: Payment intent ID generated by Chargebee.js
properties.name: id

properties.label: Gateway account ID
properties.hint: Gateway account used for performing the 3DS flow.
properties.name: gateway_account_id

properties.label: Gateway token
properties.hint: Identifier for 3DS transaction/verification object at the gateway.
properties.name: gw_token

properties.label: Reference ID
properties.hint: Identifier for Braintree permanent token. Applicable when you are using Braintree APIs for completing the 3DS flow.
properties.name: reference_id

properties.label: Additional information
properties.hint: Pass a stringified JSON. For E.g: click <a href='https://apidocs.chargebee.com/docs/api/payment_parameters#payment_intent_additonal_info_sample'>here<a> to see sample json.
properties.name: additional_info

properties.label: First name
properties.hint: The first name of the billing contact.
properties.name: first_name

properties.label: Last name
properties.hint: The last name of the billing contact.
properties.name: last_name

properties.label: State code
properties.hint: The ISO 3166-2 state/province code without the country prefix. Currently supported for USA, Canada and India
properties.name: state_code

toggle_field.name: validation_status
toggle_field.label: Customer type
toggle_field.hint: Allowed vaalues are: not_validated, valid, partially_valid, invalid

properties.label: adjustedtotal
properties.name: adjustedtotal
properties.hint: Defaults to nil if not supplied.

block.name: get_entries
block.description: Get all entries from Invoice Value Checker lookup table

input.text: An Invoice with ID #{_('data.new_connector_2_connector_374775_1631095272.a810d040.id')} has been submitted for apporval please approve #{_('data.foreach.fed0f378.entry.col2')} and the total is #{_('data.workato_variable.fe5b0f34.adjustedtotal')}
